ygData.subject: Re: a few answers to a few questons
ygData.msgSnippet: I can solo there with on other person we can take about 2 kobolds tops...( at 40) with a pet aned that was lucky hehe....Well I never really explored sol a but
ygData.messageBody:
I can solo there with on other person we can take about 2 kobolds tops...( at
40) with a pet aned that was lucky hehe....Well I never really explored sol a
but sol b was so much fun Go on archived news we had a gm even there with a
pesky level 50 monk kobold defending hes teritory we woulda beat him but he
casted some spells nagafan himself casts.....LIKE THE MASS FEAR SPELL we all
found ourseves in the upper rooms of solusek kinda scary but he killed all
the stuff in zone so we didnt die...We got mithril armor outta the
deal....That was the finnest night of my charecters life.
